EmailTemplate.name: RE: Expense question (1342649542.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Expense question (1342649542.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Buddy, You just have to supply the summery page of the bill, if you would like you can block out the other numbers. Thanks,Sara From: William Goodwin iv [mailto:wgoodwiniv@yahoo.com] Sent: Wednesday, July 18, 2012 2:36 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Expense question When posting an expense for phone/internet, do I have to include a receipt or is there another form I can include? I would prefer not to list all 12 pages of phone numbers for everyone on my plan. Thanks, Buddy
